Description:
Zscaler (NASDAQ: ZS) accelerates digital transformation so that customers can be more agile, efficient, resilient, and secure. The Zscaler Zero Trust Exchange is the company’s cloud-native platform that protects thousands of customers from cyberattacks and data loss by securely connecting users, devices, and applications in any location. With more than 10 years of experience developing, operating, and scaling the cloud, Zscaler serves thousands of enterprise customers around the world, including 450 of the Forbes Global 2000 organizations. In addition to protecting customers from damaging threats, such as ransomware and data exfiltration, it helps them slash costs, reduce complexity, and improve the user experience by eliminating stacks of latency-creating gateway appliances. Zscaler was founded in 2007 with a mission to make the cloud a safe place to do business and a more enjoyable experience for enterprise users. Zscaler’s purpose-built security platform puts a company’s defenses and controls where the connections occur—the internet—so that every connection is fast and secure, no matter how or where users connect or where their applications and workloads reside.Responsibilities/What You’ll Do:As part of the team you will be responsible for end to end delivery of a feature.
Understand the existing native automation framework, running the automation suites, analyzing the results and contributing towards existing automation.
Ability to design and implement new changes to existing automation.
Be responsible for the delivery, respectful with all team members and support inclusive team cultureUnderstand requirements, develop comprehensive test plans, execute manual and automated test cases, dig deeper into issues, identify root causes and articulate defects clearly.
Ability to learn and adapt to changing technologies and processes.
Deliver a high-quality robust product in a fast-paced environment.
Work closely with the Development, Product Management, and cloud Operations teams from design to release of the product/feature.
Define cloud deployment procedures and monitors/alerts for the features and work with the cloud deployment team for the implementation.
Recreate complex customer and production reported issues to determine root cause and verify the fix.Graduate or Masters in Computer Science Engineering or a related field.
 4+ years of experience as a Software QA Engineer in a networking and security environment.
Excellent verbal, written and interpersonal skills
Ability to develop automation scripts using python 
Has experience in working with mobile platforms like iOS and Android
Has experience in mobile networking and testing. 
Solid understanding of test case management and defect management.
Strong understanding of networking concepts at all layers.
Self-starter, takes initiative & ownership, identifies and completes tasks; goal driven
Ability to work with remote teams, handle multiple tasks, prioritize and meet deadlines
Strong in computer science fundamentals and networking concepts
Proficient in  Networking fundamentals  ( ICMP/UDP/TCP/IP,L3/L7 ) , proxies  & load balancers 
Good understanding of database schema, modeling, Rest APIs , Hypervisors and microservices architecture.
Good skill in scripting languages like Python , Java, Perl, bash  etc
Good to have basic System Load and Performance testing knowledge
Demonstrate good debugging and troubleshooting skills
Knowledge of Linux system administration , debugging and management is a plus 
Experience setting testbeds in a Virtualization environment is desirable.
Knowledge of Active Directory, VPN clients is a plus.#LI-GD1What You Can Expect From Us:An environment where you will be working on cutting edge technologies and architectures
A fun, passionate and collaborative workplace
Competitive salary and benefits, including equity
The pace and excitement of working for a Silicon Valley UnicornWhy Zscaler?

People who excel at Zscaler are smart, motivated and share our values. Ask yourself: Do you want to team with the best talent in the industry? Do you want to work on disruptive technology? Do you thrive in a fluid work environment? Do you appreciate a company culture that enables individual and group success and celebrates achievement? If you said yes, we’d love to talk to you about joining our award-winning team. 

Additional information about Zscaler (NASDAQ: ZS ) is available at https://www.zscaler.com. Zscaler is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.Why Zscaler?
